conbody.p: (a) The Contracting Officer shall insert the DOE website address https://www.energy.gov/sites/prod/files/2017/05/f34/HotlinePoster.pdf in paragraph (b)(3)(ii) of the clause at FAR 52.203-14, Display of Hotline Poster(s).
(b) The Contracting Officer shall insert the clause at 952.203-1, Identification of Contractor Employees, in all solicitations and contracts for services over the micro-purchase threshold.
